title: Bug 19089 - No popup menu in Java editor ruler (Photon)
description: Bug 19089 - No popup menu in Java editor ruler (Photon)
OB:
1) Open a Java editor.
2) Right click on the left vertical ruler.

Expected Behavior:
A menu should popup allowing the user to add breakpoints, marks, etc.

Actual Behavior:
The menu does not appear.
EB: A menu should popup allowing the user to add breakpoints, marks, etc.
